name: Burger Seaside
description:
Description

Burger Seaside is a 2d platformer game made for the Mini Jam 108. Your main goal is to collect burgers as fast as possible while also avoiding traps and killing crabs. There are 10 levels to play through - each level will have a target time to beat and a certain amount of coins to collect. Beat the time and collect all the coins to earn a three star rating on a level! See if you can collect all the burgers and coins and see if you can do it all as fast as possible.

Controls
  • Left mouse button - menu interaction
  • Left arrow key - move left
  • Right arrow key - move right
  • Up arrow key - climb up ladder
  • Down arrow key - climb down ladder
  • Z - jump
  • X - attack
  • C - roll
Credits
  • Art by Crusenho
  • Music by BitBeeps Music
  • Sounds made with BFXR
